neighbors.name: TMC Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: TMC Properties LLC is a Virginia-registered limited liability company (ID S3619568) with its official address listed c/o Nathan Roady in Montpelier, Virginia [Bloomberg LEI Registry](https://lei.bloomberg.com/leis/view/549300FKS69HOVVDAL39). The firm owns property in Baltimore County (PIN 1315370080) but no other active business operations are evident aside from holding and leasing real estate [Manta Business Directory](https://www.manta.com/mb_55_A720005L_M4C/shopping_center_property_operation_only/montpelier_va). Public filings do not disclose any parent company or individual members, indicating that beneficial ownership is not publicly reported [Bloomberg LEI Registry](https://lei.bloomberg.com/leis/view/549300FKS69HOVVDAL39).
neighbors.influence_justification: Out-of-state single-parcel owner with minimal local presence or political connections

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage principal Nathan Roady directly, highlighting how the proposed development could increase the value or utility of their property. Offer collaboration opportunities (e.g. land sale or benefit-sharing) to align their financial interest with the project.

overview_summary: One adjacent parcel is owned by an out-of-state investment LLC with no apparent local ties. This entity appears primarily motivated by property value and profit considerations, rather than community or political interests, suggesting it could be neutral or swayed by financial incentives.
